Interface ClientCardStateVisitor

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientCardStateFormatter, VoyageSidePaneTreeFactory
public interface ClientCardStateVisitor
Visitor interface that allows any implementer to distinguish between the various subclasses of ClientCardState.
